name: Vegan Strawberry Cupcakes
description: These vegan strawberry cupcakes with blueberries and coconut flakes are not only perfect for 4th of July but also for girls birthday parties!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup fresh blueberries, blended until smooth
1/2 cup fresh strawberries, blended until smooth
more strawberries and blueberries, to decorate

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and line your muffin form with 12 paper muffin liners.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and line your muffin form with 12 paper muffin liners.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter with the sugar and the salt and beat with a mixer until combined and fluffy. This should take about 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter with the sugar and the salt and beat with a mixer until combined and fluffy. This should take about 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the remaining ingredients and blend until until well combined. No large lumps should be left.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the remaining ingredients and blend until until well combined. No large lumps should be left.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide evenly among the cupcake/muffin holders and bake on a center rack for 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide evenly among the cupcake/muffin holders and bake on a center rack for 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer them to a cooling rack and let them cool down completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer them to a cooling rack and let them cool down completely.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the frosting.  Place the vegan butter into a mixing bowl and beat until light and fluffy. Then add vanilla and powdered sugar and continue mixing until thick and creamy. The frosting is supposed to be pretty thick.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the frosting.  Place the vegan butter into a mixing bowl and beat until light and fluffy. Then add vanilla and powdered sugar and continue mixing until thick and creamy. The frosting is supposed to be pretty thick.

recipeInstructions.text: If you decide to make both, the strawberry AND the blueberry frosting (the first one turns out pink and the second one purple), put half of the frosting aside. Then add 4 teaspoons of the strawberry sauce and mix until well combined. Put the frosting an icing syringe or an icing bag and put on top of six of the cupcakes. Then add the blueberry sauce to the remaining frosting, mix, and do the same to the remaining six cupcakes. If you decide to only make the strawberry frosting double the amount of strawberry sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Decorate the cupcakes with strawberries, blueberries, and coconut flakes. Serve immediately or store them in the fridge.
